sub_title: Open to opportunities | PR Intern at Gusto Collective | Research Master in Art History
summary: My strength combines a strong academic track record with excellent interpersonal and consultative communication skills. Thanks to a high level of social and cultural sensitivity, I am very adaptable to new environments and challenges. Result-driven and proactive, I enjoy working with dedicated like-minded people.
